name: The 4th is Death
description:
The 4th is Death

“The 4th is Death'' is an Action, Hack&Slash game about 4 Horsemen of the Apocalypse summoned by god to rid earth of earthlings and restore balance back to nature. 

story

You will play as Death, the 4th Horseman of the Apocalypse, summoned to wipe out all remaining life on Earth even though everything should have been killed off since the 3rd Horseman was done wreaking havoc. That’s why Death must find out why there is still life left on Earth and who was behind it. 

How to play 

Walk: W,A,S,D 

Dash: Spacebar 

Attack: Left click
